Type.Name: UnselectAllHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void UnselectAllHandler(object o, UnselectAllArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed UnselectAllHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the UnselectAllHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the UnselectAllHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the UnselectAllHandler is removed from the event.
